attributes.action: Investigate the Labour Party for contravening the Equality Act 2010
attributes.background:
On 17th February 2018 Labour are holding a rally in Loughborough. Tickets for this event are priced at £40 for visitors and £30 if you are of a BAME (Black Asian Minority Ethnic) group.
The effect of this is to make white British people pay more for the same event which is direct racism and illegal

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament or Government are not responsible for investigating contraventions of the Equality Act 2010. 

If you believe that you may have been discriminated against, you can find out how to take action here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/taking-action-about-discrimination/
